statements: SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM credit_scores WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, last_updated FROM credit_scores WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, borrower_name, credit_score, last_updated FROM credit_scores ORDER BY borrower_name ASC, credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY borrower_name ASC;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM credit_scores WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, last_updated FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score < 600 AND borrower_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT id, borrower_name, last_updated FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 650 AND 750 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(credit_score) AS highest_credit_score FROM credit_scores;
SELECT * FROM borrower_credit_scores;
SELECT borrower_id, credit_score FROM borrower_credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM credit_alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT alert_message, alert_date FROM credit_alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT borrower_id FROM credit_alerts;
SELECT * FROM borrower_credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT borrower_id, credit_score FROM borrower_credit_scores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_alerts WHERE alert_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT borrower_id, alert_message FROM credit_alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%urgent%' OR alert_message LIKE '%important%';
SELECT borrower_id, credit_score, alert_date FROM borrower_credit_scores JOIN credit_alerts ON borrower_credit_scores.borrower_id = credit_alerts.borrower_id;
SELECT * FROM Borrowers;
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name FROM Borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name DESC;
SELECT credit_score, borrower_name FROM Borrowers JOIN CreditScores ON Borrowers.borrower_id = CreditScores.borrower_id;
SELECT borrower_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT borrower_name, alert_date FROM Borrowers JOIN CreditRiskAlerts ON Borrowers.borrower_id = CreditRiskAlerts.borrower_id ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM Borrowers ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY check_date ASC;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_risk_message FROM Borrowers JOIN CreditRiskAlerts ON Borrowers.borrower_id = CreditRiskAlerts.borrower_id WHERE Borrowers.credit_score < 600;
SELECT AVG(credit_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_borrowers FROM CreditScores;
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name, credit_score FROM borrower_info;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM borrower_info WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM borrower_info ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM borrower_info WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT MAX(credit_score) AS max_credit_score FROM borrower_info;
SELECT * FROM borrower_info WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY borrower_name DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name FROM borrower_info WHERE credit_score <= 600 ORDER BY borrower_id;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM borrower_info WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800 ORDER BY credit_score ASC, borrower_name DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, credit_score FROM borrower_info WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY borrower_id, credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM borrower_info WHERE credit_score < 500 OR credit_score > 800 ORDER BY credit_score DESC, borrower_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM Borrowers;
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_status FROM Borrowers JOIN Loans ON Borrowers.borrower_id = Loans.borrower_id;
SELECT alert_message, alert_date FROM CreditAlerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Borrowers INNER JOIN Loans ON Borrowers.borrower_id = Loans.borrower_id;
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM Borrowers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_status FROM Borrowers LEFT JOIN Loans ON Borrowers.borrower_id = Loans.borrower_id WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM CreditAlerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(credit_score) AS average_score FROM CreditScores GROUP BY borrower_id;
